document_data.mainbody:
urthkin was a halfling in Faer√ªn in the 14 century DR.
Supposedly, he was born in a small log hut.
He eloped with the human daughter of one Guirath Moondock she was short enough that she could almost pass for a halfling herself. They married and had a petite half-human half-halfling daughter. She in turn married a human man, and their son was Jasper, who lived in Ghars, Cormyr, by 1366 DR. Jasper aspired to be halfling rogue like his "Grandpaw Hurthkin".
According to his grandson Jasper, Hurthkin liked to take advantage of humans as much as any halfling.
